Introduction

Xu Ziyin, also known as Roada Xu, is a Chinese singer and actress signed with T Entertainment. She was a participant in the hit Korean survival show, Girls Planet 999 and the Chinese reality survival shows Youth With You 2 and The Next Top Bang.

On February 19, 2021, Xu Ziyin debuted as a soloist in China with the release of her first EP, “IN”.

Fun facts

1
Dreamcatcher's Handong visited Xu Ziyin and they had a meal together before she returned to Korea for her group's activities. The two have met during their time in Youth With You 2.
…
2
Her nickname is "Rou" which means "meat" in Chinese.
…
3
She has studied Bel Canto for 6 years.
…
4
Xu Ziyin revealed she put more effort in the dance when preparing for her demo stage in Girls Planet 999 because she thinks she can sing well.
…
5
Despite her survival after the second elimination, Xu Ziyin left Girls Planet 999 due to health problems.
